OOC: this is NOT an angry OOC. =P
Airly, Razorclaw didn't shoot the grenade back at Khonkolor, he 
just blew it up, and covered his face. =)

::Razorclaw::
He leaps over Khonkolor's fire, and beyond the bot, spinning in mid 
air to face him as he lands on the ground. "A little woozy, bot?" he 
fires four concussion blasts at Khonkolor.


On 11 Apr 2001, at 5:21, airly2000@... wrote:

> Khonkolor:
> 
> Khonkolor avoiding the granade and tried to cover. He suddenly turn 
> his body and shot against Razorclaw.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Razorclaw::
> > Razorclaw jumps back, shooting the grenade and covering his face 
> > with his arm to prevent any serious damage. He pulls his Sonic 
> > Sword out of subspace, and rushes Khonkolor swinging with 
> > ferocity.
